subject_terms_3: Black-and-white photography Photography Rail transport (Stations) Tanjong Pagar Railway Station
physical_appearance: "The image shows a photograph in black-and-white.The left side of the photograph shows the waiting area of Tanjong Pagar railway station, where some people can be seen to be sitting down and pacing. At the foreground of the photograph, an elderly man wearing a watch is sitting down. He is looking towards a coffee shop with its name in Arabic characters. Food such as sandwiches and beverages like coffee and tea are present in the stall. Two ladies are standing behind the counter of the coffee shop. Numerous glass cups and mineral water bottles are stacked on the counter. A sign informing that the coffee shop is a ""No Smoking Area by Law"" is stated at the bottom of the top shelf
subject_terms_1: located on the right of the photograph" railroad stations coffee shops
subject_terms_2: canteens (eating and recreation spaces) Pertadbiran Keretapi Tanah Melayu Canteens (Establishments) Railroad stations Coffee shops
